contactUs__description: Feel free to contact us 24/7 with any questions or service requests. We are here waiting for you and will be ready to respond as quickly as possible.

ServiceLevelAgreement.title: Service Level Agreement
ServiceLevelAgreement.description: In alignment with the directives of the Saudi Data and Artificial Intelligence Authority (SDAIA) to enhance the quality of services provided to beneficiaries through digital services, and in accordance with the directives of the wise leadership to exert all efforts to achieve the satisfaction of beneficiaries, including citizens and partners, by making the external portal services of SDAIA and electronic services, as well as smart devices, available in the easiest and most convenient ways. This does not include the time taken to process transactions by a third party, such as other government entities, in cases where the nature of the transactions requires it.

Mechanisms.title: Providing Mechanisms for Communication and Participation
Mechanisms.description: The Authority is committed to interact and respond to inquiries received through the website

help.title: Help and Support
help.description: The SDAIA website provides assistance and support to beneficiaries in a way that accommodates the largest number of visitors. This is done by providing readable content, multimedia, and detailed information, in addition to some support means such as: communication channels ,suggestions and complaints and frequently asked questions

organizationalStructure.title: Organizational Structure
organizationalStructure.description: An illustrative diagram of the organizational structure of the complex, containing all the departments of the complex, the board of trustees, and the committees.
